title: Yanhao Wang
text:
Yanhao Wang




Welcome to my website!
I am an Assistant Professor of Business Economics at the Alberta School of Business, University of Alberta. I received my Ph.D. from the Kelley School of Business, Indiana University. I work on topics in health care, household finance, and industrial organization.
